name: AntiHepatitisBVirusSurfaceAb
title: Anti Hepatitis B Virus Surface Ab
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The purpose of this value set is to represent concepts for the detection of the anti Hepatitis B surface antigen.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use a model element related to Laboratory Test.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes concepts that represent tests for the anti-surface antibody to Hepatitis B virus in serum.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes concepts that represent an order only.)
